name: OCHA Humanitarian Icons for GIS
tagline: The OCHA Humanitarian Icons for use in ArcGIS and QGIS
body:
In 2012, the United Nations Office for the Coordination of Humanitarian affairs (OCHA) has created a set of 500 freely available humanitarian icons to help relief workers present emergency and crisis-related information quickly and simply. These were created in png format. See [Humanitarian and Country Icons 2012](http://reliefweb.int/report/world/world-humanitarian-and-country-icons-2012) for further details.

MapAction has converted these icons into a true type font format. These are then available as stylesheets for in ArcGIS and QGIS.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
